# Aggregate Model Function

```{r aggregate model}

# X variables is a vector; input would be ADL variables
aggregate_model <- function(Y_dataframe, X_variables, f_horizon){
  for (i in 1:length(X_variables)){
    X_ts <- get(X_variables[i])
    forecast <- ADL_predict_all(Y_dataframe, X_ts, f_horizon)
    print(forecast)
  }
}

aggregate_model(GDPGrowth_ts, ADL_variables, 1)



```
